ygData.subject: Re: A positive customer service tale ......
ygData.msgSnippet: Glad to see Verrants backing you up on this one Melaniel! It was so nice to see a positive result to an unhappy situation. I personally have not had that
ygData.messageBody:
Glad to see Verrants backing you up on this one Melaniel! It was so nice to
see a positive result to an unhappy situation. I personally have not had
that situation occur but I have restarted from scratch before, and it was
HARD. Of my own choice at lvl 22ish I pretty much gave up all the items I
had and restarted building my collection of goodies. My reason was a good
one I think, and I have never once regretted the loss of my plate, or my
well balanced weapons ( HOW did I get them so young you ask? Well I was
gifted them by a more powerful player and without going into the details my
honor required me to return them) At any rate good luck to you!

Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 36th Chorus
Innoruuk Server
